idea: LIFTON CHAINS AND TACKLES PRIVATE LIMITED is a well known name, primarily known for its unmatched quality and delivery schedule for its products. We are a determined manufacturer and exporter of all kind of Chains and Slings well suited for all kinds of industrial purposes. We are well established and well equipped in order to provide 30 tons of Hoisting and Lifting Grade 100 / 80 / 43 / 35 and 20 tons of stainless steel Monthly. Our range of Industrial Chains & equipments includes Industrial Chains, Chain Fitting & Hooks, Metal Chains, Brass Chains, Alloy Steel Chains, Conveyor Chains, Open Link Chain, Stainless Steel Chains, Lashing Chains & Holding Hooks, High Tensile Steel Chains, Short link Stainless Steel Chains etc. We have a large number of products range which includes Alloy Steel Chains of Grade 100/80/70 for Hoisting, Load Lifting and American transportation industry respectively. We have steel chains of different grades which can be used for Hoisting, Load Lifting and can even be used for common purpose like Fencing. Apart from Chains, we offer open Anchor Cables, Self Locking hooks, different kinds of Slings and Conveyor Chains. Our production size in generalize terms ranges from 2 mm to 20 mm. We also manufacture a whole lot of other products such as Chain Accessories and Forging.
name: LIFTON CHAINS AND TACKLES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Pick-Local a tech-enabled truck aggregator goods transport company that offers you transportation solutions to cater to all your goods movement. We are focused to deliver quality service at a competitive price, and back up every shipment with trending technology & satisfying customer service.

Pick Local is startup originated in a revolutionary way by a group of Logistic and Tech experts bagged up skills of experience and a thorough knowledge of this unique platform and aim to serve the local market efficiently. we work with consumers, small businesses, and big global brands to enable same-day and urgent delivery at your destination and multiple destinations.

Our community of 500 verified drivers ready to serve the largest on-demand shipping, same-day in the city Mumbai and Intra-city. We make it easier for enterprises to launch and scale same-day delivery to reach customers anytime, anywhere. With the local most flexible and Scalable delivery solution.
name: Picklocal - Truck Easy, Move Easy

idea:
Suraj is a CA rank holder, he has more than 7 years of work experience in Audit, Project Finance & Investment Management. He oversees the finance vertical at Fseed Consulting. In the past he has worked with EY, Tata Trusts and GOI. He has executed fund reconciliation for Government of Uttar Pradesh. He’s a startup enthusiast and is currently mentoring multiple startups. 

When not working, he loves traveling and has travelled to more than 50 cities in India and 7 countries. You can talk to him about crazy travel/trek/dog/rural India stories which inspires him.
name: Suraj Singh

idea:
UniAcco aggregates Purpose Built Student Accommodation (PBSA) properties on its online platform and enables customers to compare, consult and choose these properties through this platform. We also offer guarantor, visa consultation , banking and financing services and deliver these through our strategic partnerships. 

Our Vision is to bring about a prop-tech revolution by creating a cross border platform that integrates students and property managers throughout the world and eliminates gaps in the searching/sorting experience. We aim to become the world’s leading PBSA (Purpose Built Student Accommodation) firm that provides a personalized experience to every student accommodation seeker, ensuring quality properties and hassle-free accommodation.
name: ADVENTUM STUDENT LIVING PRIVATE LIMITED
